name: Yet Another Game About Balls
description:
This is a early prototype alpha thing of a game about balls, basket balls!

I dont even like basket ball, or games about basket ball.
Not sure why I wanted to make one!

Disclaimer!!!
Tthis is a very early alpha prototype! so if you have ANY feedback or bug reports please leave a comment, most art and menus are placeholder and mechanics will be refined and better, this is just so I can let people know that this is a thing that exists and is out there.
-How to play-
arrow keys to move and jump

collide with the enemy when they have the ball to steal it.

collide with the ball to pick it up.

mouse click to shoot the ball.

and thats all!
The goal of the game is simple, beat the other team by scoring more baskets!
